description.value:
Your siblings each inherited money or land, but you received a strange, seemingly useless trinket—along with the advice that maybe you weren’t cut out for an ordinary, peaceful life.

Benefit: You have a somewhat inoperative 2nd-echelon [[reference trinket]] of the Director’s choice. This trinket functions only while the total of your level plus your Victories is 5 or higher. You don’t learn what the trinket’s powers are until the first time it becomes operative.

Drawback: With no other inheritance, you accumulated debts. The first time your Wealth exceeds 1, you lose 1 Wealth.
